data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Bahia, Brazil to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bahia, Brazil
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Bahia, Brazil be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 4 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Bahia. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Bahia, Brazil. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Baena people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Baena people.
Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Bahia that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 14,175,300 souls in Bahia and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 3,535,206 believers in Bahia and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

location.name: Bahia
location.cities_list: Salvador, Feira de Santana, Vitória da Conquista, Itabuna, Camaçari
location.cities_list_w_pop: Salvador (2,711,840), Feira de Santana (619,609), Vitória da Conquista (253,137), Itabuna (205,660), Camaçari (188,758)
